channel.title: CVE Feed for Zoom Video Communications Inc -- Zoom Rooms for macOS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Zoom Video Communications Inc -- Zoom Rooms for macOS

item.title: CVE-2022-36926|2024-08-03T10:14:29.473Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%20inc -- zoom%20rooms%20for%20macos
item.description: Zoom Rooms for macOS clients before version 5.11.3 contain a local privilege escalation vulnerability. A local low-privileged user could exploit this vulnerability to escalate their privileges to root.

item.title: CVE-2022-36927|2024-08-03T10:14:29.437Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%20inc -- zoom%20rooms%20for%20macos
item.description: Zoom Rooms for macOS clients before version 5.11.3 contain a local privilege escalation vulnerability. A local low-privileged user could exploit this vulnerability to escalate their privileges to root.

item.title: CVE-2022-36925|2024-08-03T10:14:29.461Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%20inc -- zoom%20rooms%20for%20macos
item.description: Zoom Rooms for macOS clients before version 5.11.4 contain an insecure key generation mechanism. The encryption key used for IPC between the Zoom Rooms daemon service and the Zoom Rooms client was generated using parameters that could be obtained by a local low-privileged application. That key can then be used to interact with the daemon service to execute privileged functions and cause a local denial of service.
